verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
When the fire is burning all around you,
you will never be consumed
by the flames.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When the fear of lonliness is looming
then then remember
I am at your side.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When you dwell in the exile
of the stranger,
remember you are precious in My eyes.

verse.name: v5
c1
verse.lines:
Do not be afraid,
for I have redeemed you.
I have called you by your name;
you are Mine
